ED_Title: Document considered by the General Assembly in connection with the question of social development
ED_DecisionText:
At its 65th plenary meeting, on 19 December 2016, the General Assembly, on the recommendation of the Third Committee,  took note of the note by the Secretariat entitled “World Social Situation 2016: Leaving No One Behind – the Imperative of Inclusive Development”  submitted under the item entitled “Social development”.

(See A/71/476, para. 28, A/71/PV.65)
ED_Disclaimer: The text of this decision is available in all languages in document A/71/49 (Vol. II).
